Html:
Howdy, I am trying to get started using this control for a project I am working on, I must say though it looks pretty awesome! However I am having some trouble with it. 

Let me explain. I downloaded the Windows From version of the control then i added it to my control toolbar, dragged it over to the new form i made.  On the Form's Load event I gave it a zoom of 13, a current position with a lat and long i knew, and then called the reload map method.

While a map of the world shows up nothing I can seem to do to get it to zoom into the street level or anything like that. The best i can do is seen entire continents lol Any ideas what I am doing wrong? Thanks a ton!

 

Phil

I figured my issue out, I was a moron, no worries =)

 

Basically I downloaded the source and looked through the code of the demo app and figured out my issues
